analysis.description:
Crowdsale.rate (/unique_chucks/4/0xdb0f69306ff8f949f258e83f6b87ee5d052d0b23.sol#306) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xdb0f69306ff8f949f258e83f6b87ee5d052d0b23.sol#346-361)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xdb0f69306ff8f949f258e83f6b87ee5d052d0b23.sol#346-361) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0xdb0f69306ff8f949f258e83f6b87ee5d052d0b23.sol#359-360)
